articles.title: US opposes Trump request to remove judge in federal election case
articles.description: U.S. Special Counsel Jack Smith on Thursday opposed Donald Trump’s request to remove the federal judge overseeing the criminal case accusing the former U.S. president of attempting to subvert the results of the 2020 election.

articles.content:

articles.title: Trump's 2024 campaign and trial schedule overlap is chaotic.
articles.description: Stories about Mitt Romney, Elon Musk's biography, a tired trope in Black horror, and more.
articles.content:

articles.title: Special counsel seeks limits on Trump's statements in elections case
articles.description: U.S. Special Counsel Jack Smith is asking a judge to impose limits on statements from former President Donald Trump regarding a Washington, D.C., court case over his attempt to overturn his 2020 election defeat, according to a court filing on Friday.

articles.author: CBC.ca
articles.title: Accused killer of Muslim family explains in post-arrest rant his rationale for truck attack in London, Ont.
articles.description: In the hours after his truck attack on a Muslim family in London, Ont., in June 2021, the accused killer told police his anger at minority groups began with online research about politics and Donald Trump's election for U.S. president, and spiralled down a "rabbit hole" that led to anger and rage he could no longer ignore.
articles.content:
Warning: This story contains distressing details.
